pkgmetadata.longdescription: Reviewed Official Classification of Endangered Wild Flora Species in Peru // Provide users with a convenient way to access and analyze information on endangered plant species in Peru based on `Decreto Supremo N 043-2006-AG - Aprueban categorizacion de especies amenazadas de flora silvestre`https://sinia.minam.gob.pe/normas/aprueban- categorizacion-especies-amenazadas-flora-silvestre.
